execMql

public static String execMql(ParameterCache_mxJPO _paramCache,
                             CharSequence _cmd)
                      throws matrix.util.MatrixException
Executes given MQL command and returns the trimmed result of the MQL execution.

Parameters:
_paramCache - parameter cache
_cmd - MQL command to execute
Returns:
trimmed result of the MQL execution
Throws:
matrix.util.MatrixException - if MQL execution failed

execMql

public static String execMql(matrix.db.Context _context,
                             CharSequence _cmd,
                             boolean _includeMQLCommand)
                      throws matrix.util.MatrixException
Executes given MQL command and returns the trimmed result of the MQL execution.

Parameters:
_context - MX context for this request
_cmd - MQL command to execute
_includeMQLCommand - must be MQL command included in the exception?
Returns:
trimmed result of the MQL execution
Throws:
matrix.util.MatrixException - if MQL execution failed; includes the MQL command if _includeMQLCommand is set to true
